text: Woh waqt bhi yaad karne ke qabil hai jabke munkireen e haqq tere khilaf tadbeerein soch rahey thay ke tujhey qaid kardein ya qatal kar dalein ya jila-watan (drive you away) kardein. Woh apni chaalein chal rahey thay aur Allah apni chaal chal raha tha. Aur Allah sab se behtar chaal chalne wala hai
